body.content:
Dear Sir,

My name is Mr Neil Trotter aged 79, Croatian citizen, and I am currently
ill and given my age and my current state of health during Covid-19
Pandemic period that is shaking the world, I am not married and i have no
child. I have some money and property which worth about EUR 650,000.00

I wish to donate this money & property to an honest and a good hearted
Person, who can help people at this difficult period of COVID 19,
especially orphans, widows, physically challenged people, elderly and
children in difficult situations.

This Donation is a gift, and I will be happy, if you can manage this fund
well with the fear of the Lord to make sure that it serves the less
privileged people around your community, especially orphans and widows.

It is really sad to tell you that I have lost My two brothers in Italy and
My cousin in Spain and my two  close friends  in Serbia and Croatia through
this dangerous pandemic (COVID-19).

Hope to read from you in order to advise further. Attached with this
message is a copy of my passport for your file.

Kind regards,

Mr Neil Trotter
Email: d.neiltrotter@gmail.com
